name: DinoCop - Jurassic Justice
description:
Prototype:

This is a prototype game made for the Computer Graphics Project class at UFRGS.

Controls:

-WASD to move;
-Mouse to aim;
-Left-click for a light attack;
-Right-click for a heavy attack;
-Space for shield;
-Crtl to change stances (Melee/Ranged);

Major problems:

-FPS drop when too many enemies are being rendered;
-Settings menu not implemented;

Developers:

-Programmer: Claudio Rodrigo Gisch
-Artist: Alexandre Santos da Silva Jr
